__e: Well, last time I checked, this isn't war, and I'm not a soldier, but Stefan is one of the best people that I know, and when it comes to saving his life, yes, I will do just about anything--
And the last time I checked, you were the last one feeling sorry about it.
It's not exactly me, or you, the last time I checked.
Well, I just checked and I'm pretty sure I'm not sitting with the girls. I'm sitting with you.
I looked it up and--oh,wait,maybe you know this too.
Well, uh... I looked on your phone, and not only did you get no texts from him that night, but, uh, over the past year, you barely texted at all.
Remember when I first came back from the hospital with Lisa, and you couldn t stop checking up on her, to see she was OK?
You didn't want me to take a body with someone in it. And I made sure that the spirit was gone.
I looked out to see if my car was back and saw you kissing a guy.
